description:
The ESCAPE 48 eSKIN is a sporty yet classic ski designed for maximum stability and control. Its low heel-toe camber and SKINGRIP+ technology give it a secure, waxless grip. The ski is delivered pre-mounted with the Prolink Shift binding.

  • Core is Densolite 2000, light in weight, but with consistent torsional stiffness
  • S-cut sidecut has a light carving sidecut behind the foot and a wider platform at the front for more control and stability
  • Heel-Toe Camber provides easy kick and compression when pressing with the forefoot but remains lifted when pressing with the mid or rear of the foot
  • eSkinGrip+ waxless technology uses an integrated strip of skin underfoot so you don't need grip wax
  • Digital control of the moulding press allows optimal flex and camber for specific performance on snow
  • Precise stone grinding for easy glide in all snow conditions
name: Salomon Escape 48 eSKIN X-Stiff Skis + Prolink Shift Binding - Unisex
